channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The IPO Market Gets Cold Feet
item.description: Fears of stock turbulence could further delay a rebound in companies’ new listings.

item.title: PetroChina posts record earnings for first half of the year
item.description: PetroChina posted a record-high operating profit for the first half of the year on the back of strong drilling output and higher oil prices.

item.title: Why 7-Eleven Is So Enticing to Circle K's Owner
item.description: The Japanese conglomerate would provide immediate growth in the U.S., but it won’t come easy.

item.title: Here's why you must keep the faith in Nvidia even if this week's earnings fail to wow
item.description: Nvidia's release on Wednesday won't make it the most important day of the year even as so many think it will be.

item.title: Warren Buffett Is Selling Bank of America. Maybe You Should Buy It.
item.description: The lender has some advantages relative to its megabank peers in an interest-rate-cutting scenario.

item.title: 2 big tests ahead will determine if last week's stock market excitement was warranted
item.description: Wall Street takes back-to-back weekly gains and an overbought market into an important week.

item.title: The U.S. Corn Crop Is Great. Farmers' Finances, Not So Much.
item.description: Grain prices have been in free fall since the Covid commodity boom ended, forcing some on the farm to consider difficult changes.

item.title: Cava earnings beat estimates as restaurant traffic climbs nearly 10%
item.description: The Mediterranean restaurant chain Cava said its fiscal second-quarter traffic climbed 9.5%, bucking industry trends.

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Series
item.description: Check out the stocks Heard on the Street writers favor in their eighth annual stock-picking contest.

item.title: Peloton shares soar 35% as turnaround plan takes hold, losses shrink
item.description: Peloton has been working to generate free cash flow and return to profitability, and has made cuts to sales and marketing budgets to improve its balan...
